title: Cloud Native
description: Create organisation and profile our free tier.
section_0_description_0: By default, ZITADEL stores your data in Switzerland. Optionally, storage in another region (EU / US) or global can take place at a later time in 2020.
section_0_description_1: ZITADEL is completely open source with an Apache 2.0 license. All processes and sources are available and can be checked.
section_1_description: Integrate ZITADEL into your application in a few simple steps. Simply use an OpenID Connect Library of your choice or use our SDKs.
section_2_description: Wir bieten Ihnen natürlich auch massgeschneiderte Enterprise Lösungen an. Kontaktieren Sie uns einfach für ein kostenloses Angebot.
section_3_description: ZITADEL relies on proven standards to ensure the greatest possible security.
